title: New free champion rotation: Draven, Draven, and Draven!

replies.body:
hello internet, welcome to League theory, the draven thingy has been disabled...





























































URF TIME
Just give us U.R.F already plz

give players the option to take the draven bobble heads of, its f@#kn stupid. and its ruining the game. taking the fun out. you dont have to remove it, just give the option to turn it off, just cause you like dont mean its a good idea, i mena, hitler thought what he was doing was a good idea.
dude why dont u love the DRAAAAVEN {{champion:119}}
